Title: Paragraph
data: This installation was created as the result of an invitation by Jacques Rivet and Marie-Laure Viale from the french association Entre-Deux (artpublic.entredeux.free.fr/) based in Nantes.

Title: Paragraph
data: The main idea was to illustrate three dimensions of the place which is an art-gallery a workplace and a house. Impacts on the floor were recorded with piezo sensors and a few mics were placed to capture actions. The recordings were treated as real-time data to create a soundscapes / melodies / rythms to be broadcast in the street as echoes of the activities inside.
